These events provided an opportunity for candidates to learn more about the company culture, meet team members, and explore available positions. Examples of such job fairs include the Diversity in Tech Summit and the Consulting Industry Conference.
2. Webinars: SYLVAIN hosted a series of webinars focused on topics relevant to both potential employees and existing team members. These webinars covered subjects such as "The Future of Work" and "Incorporating Gender-Inclusivity into Your Business Strategy." They allowed participants to engage with experts and thought leaders in the field, as well as network with peers.
3. Trainings and Workshops: Throughout the year, SYLVAIN conducted numerous internal and external trainings and workshops related to professional development, personal growth, and industry knowledge. For example, the company offered sessions on emotional intelligence, effective communication, and navigating complex problem-solving scenarios. Additionally, SYLVAIN collaborated with external partners to provide specialized workshops, such as a mental health first aid training session conducted in collaboration with a local mental health organization.
